name: Reincarnation Tower
description:
Reincarnation Tower is a challenging 2D platform. To aim for the top, sometimes you need patience and sometimes mental strength. One mistake can ruin your efforts, but you will have learned a lot.

・GamePlay

The operation is simple. the vertical and horizontal height of the jump is determined by the length of the input.
Also, after the jump, there's no choice but to watch over.

・Reincarnation

It is a system in which playable characters are unlocked according to your achievements.
New characters will bring you different experiences.
